name: TradeMe widgets
author: Andrew Connell

sections.description:
This plugin enables you to easily include your TradeMe listings or feedback directly on your site. You can also include
the result of any custom search very easily.
sections.installation:
Automatic installation

This plugin can be easily installed from your WordPress dashboard. Go to the Plugins section and click Add New, find
the plugin and add it.

Manual installation

  1. Upload trademe-widget.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
How do I use this plugin?

Full instructions are available at BidBud
sections.changelog:
1.2

  • Feedback widget is also styled automatically according to the css on your site.
  • Switched to https so that widget will work with secure sites.

1.1

  • Widget is now styled automatically according to the css on your site

1.0

  • Initial release
